body:
SB Software is looking for a full-time/part time Help Desk Agent with teamwork abilities, good communication and interacting capacities to provide 1st and 2nd level client specific product/software support. 

The job responsibilities are: 
• According assistance to clients over the phone;
• To provide specific software support to stores and retail customers
• You will handle incoming phone calls, web-submits and e-mails received
• You will diagnose, troubleshoot and solve 1st level Help-Desk issues
• Outbound calls to customers will be sometimes necessary, in order to provide them feedback and solutions on their specific problems

Cerinte
The ideal candidate: 
• You are fluent in ITALIAN; ENGLISH is a plus
• Medium IT skills (MS Office, Hardware, Software, Operating Systems, Acrobat Reader)
• Retail or call center environment experience is highly desirable

Oferta (bonusuri, beneficii)
We offer you a rewarding working environment where personal initiative and development are encouraged, together with a comprehensive and ongoing learning. We are also offering you an attractive salary, including various benefits, according to the turnover.
• Very attractive salary 
• Performance bonus at the end of the year
• Meal tickets
• Intensive and continuous FREE training, providing opportunity for personal and professional development
•Opportunity to develop a carrier into an international environment
•The possibility of working full time or part time.
title: Analist Servicii Client
